pkgmetadata.longdescription: Boolean========.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/scisco/boolean.svg?branch=develop :target: https://travis-ci.org/scisco/boolean.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/boolean.svg :target: http://badge.fury.io/py/boolean.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/boolean.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/boolean/ :alt: LicenseConverts strings such as "true", "True", "y", "n", ... to their equivalent Boolean value.Installation------------.. code:: $ pip install booleanUsage-----.. code:: >>> from boolean import boolean >>> boolean('True') True >>> boolean('t') True >>> boolean('f') False >>> boolean('False') False
